snippet.title: Disney Dreamlight Valley – Scar's Kingdom Update Trailer
snippet.description:
The first major content update for Disney Dreamlight Valley is here! Meet and team up with one of the Pride Land’s most well-known villains, Scar, to bring back the Sunlit Plateau to a green and vibrant state. Open the new Star Path and progress your way through to unlock tons of new cosmetics to help you express your villainous side. 
 
Play now: https://disneydreamlightvalley.com/getnow
 
Join the community on:
 
Instagram: http://instagram.com/disneydreamlightvalley
Twitter: http://twitter.com/DisneyDLV
Facebook: http://facebook.com/DisneyDreamlightValley
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/disneydreamlightvalley
